trigger.Name: cinExchangeVehFirst
trigger.script: -- println("--- ABVBVB") SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL) TActivate("cinExchangeVehFirst_End") TActivate("cinExchangeVehFirst_FadeIn") Fly("Garage_Path_First", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, nil, 15, 1,0) StartCinematic() AddCinematicMessage( 8, 0.25 ) AddCinematicMessage( 9, 0.25 ) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinExchangeVehFirst_FadeIn
trigger.script:
if GetPlayerVehicle() then GetPlayerVehicle():SetThrottle( 0 ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(getPos("PlCarPos_loc"))) end
if GetEntityByName("PlayerScout") then GetEntityByName("PlayerScout"):SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(2780.496, 264.953, 2087.660)) GetEntityByName("PlayerScout"):SetRotation(Quaternion(0.001, -0.000, 0.000, 1.000)) GetEntityByName("PlayerScout"):SetCustomLinearVelocity(0) end
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinExchangeVehFirst_End
trigger.script: TActivate("trExcahgeVehAction") -- println("EEEEEEEEEEEEENNNNNNNNNNNDDDDDDDDDDDD") RestoreAllToleranceStatus() SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle() trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinExcahgeVehAction_End
trigger.script: GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("ExitToGaragePath") GetPlayerVehicle():PlaceToEndOfPath("ExitToGaragePath") setRot(GetPlayerVehicle(), Quaternion(0.008, 0.399, 0.003, -0.917)) SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle() trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinWentToFactory
trigger.script:
-- Fly("WentFactory_Path1", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, nil, 2, 1,0) SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL) TActivate("cinWentFactory_PathStart") TActivate("cinWentFactory_End") Fly("WentFactory_Path2", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, nil, 15, 1,0) Fly("WentFactory_Path3", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, nil, 7, 0,1) StartCinematic() PlayCustomMusic("Techno04") AddCinematicMessage( 14, 3 )
GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetThrottle( 0 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinWentFactory_PathStart
trigger.script: GetPlayerVehicle():SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(2459.292, 260.596, 2563.911)) GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("FactoryRailRoadPath") AddCinematicMessage( 15, 0.25 ) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinWentFactory_End
trigger.script:
GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("FactoryRailRoadPath") GetPlayerVehicle():PlaceToEndOfPath("FactoryRailRoadPath") -- setRot(GetPlayerVehicle(), Quaternion(0.008, 0.399, 0.003, -0.917)) StopPlayingCustomMusic() SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle() RestoreAllToleranceStatus() TActivate("trExcahgeVehFirst")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinPlTurnRoundFactory_PathStart
trigger.script: GetPlayerVehicle():SetThrottle( 0 ) GetPlayerVehicle():LimitMaxSpeed( 6 ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinWentFactory_Path2
trigger.script: AddCinematicMessage(7, 0.25) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinPlTurnRoundFactory_FadeIn
trigger.script: setRot(GetPlayerVehicle(), Quaternion(0.000, 0.999, 0.005, -0.050)) setPos(GetPlayerVehicle(), CVector(getPos("FactoryPlTurn_loc"))) GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("EnterToFactoryPath") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinPlTurnRoundFactory_End
trigger.script: GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("EnterToFactoryPath") GetPlayerVehicle():PlaceToEndOfPath("EnterToFactoryPath") setRot(GetPlayerVehicle(), Quaternion(0.009, 0.999, 0.004, -0.051)) -- setPos(GetPlayerVehicle(), CVector(2389.690, 258.985, 2754.862)) SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle() GetPlayerVehicle():UnlimitMaxSpeed() trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinNearMonster
trigger.script:
GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetThrottle(0) SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
TActivate("cinStopMusik_End") TActivate("cinNearMonster_FadeIn") TActivate("cinNearMonster_End")
PlayCustomMusic("IntenseDialogue01")
Fly("NearMonster_Path1", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, nil, 16.5, 1,1) StartCinematic()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinNearMonster_FadeIn
trigger.script:
-- println("!!!!!!!!!!!")
local mnstr = TeamCreate("TeamBigMonster",1022,CVector(getPos("Monster_loc")),{"RobotTron"}) if mnstr then TActivate("trBigMonsterDie") mnstr:GetVehicle(0):AddItemsToRepository("firing_rate_guns_and_add_damage_guns", 1) mnstr:GetVehicle(0):AddItemsToRepository("hammer01", 1) end
local monster = getObj("TeamBigMonster_vehicle_0") if monster then setPos(monster,CVector(getPos("Monster_loc"))) pos = CVector(monster:GetPosition()) monsterid = monster:GetId() pos.y = pos.y + 20 pos.z = pos.z + 15 end
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetThrottle(0) vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(1261.543, 330.976, 1402.082)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.113, 0.524, 0.041, 0.843)) end
AddCinematicMessage( 12, 1 ) AddCinematicMessage( 13, 1 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinNearMonster_End
trigger.script: StopPlayingCustomMusic() SetCameraDirectionToObj(getObj("TeamBigMonster_vehicle_0"):GetId()) RestoreAllToleranceStatus() CompleteQuest("r3m2_MonterHead1") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinMonsterDie
trigger.script:
GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) PlayCustomMusic("IntenseDialogue03") TActivate("cinStopMusik_End") local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 20 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 20
-- Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled(true) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity(0) Plf:SetThrottle(0) -- Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled(false)
FlyAround(6, 0.3, 25, 23, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1) StartCinematic() AddCinematicMessage( 1001, 0.25 ) AddCinematicMessage( 1002, 0.25 ) AddCinematicMessage( 1003, 0.25 ) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinWentOracleDef
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 )
PlayCustomMusic("IntenseDialogue01") TActivate("cinWentOracleDef_FadeIn") TActivate("cinWentOracleDef_End") FlyLinked( "OralceDef_Path1", GetPlayerVehicle():GetId(), 8, 1, 1, GetPlayerVehicle():GetId(), nil, 1) --FlyLinked( PathName, Id, PlayTime, StartFade, EndFade, LookToId, VisPanel, RelativeRotations, WaitWhenStop, InterpolateFromPrevious ) StartCinematic() trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinWentOracleDef_FadeIn
trigger.script: if GetPlayerVehicle() then GetPlayerVehicle():SetThrottle( 3 ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 10 ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(getPos("PointPlayer1_loc"))) GetPlayerVehicle():SetRotation(Quaternion(0.044, 0.591, 0.010, -0.805)) GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("playerToOracledefPath") end local veh = getObj("OracleDefenders_vehicle_0") if veh then veh:SetExternalPathByName("OracleDef1_1") veh:PlaceToEndOfPath("OracleDef1_1") veh:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.025, -0.863, 0.060, -0.501)) veh:SetExternalPathByName("OracleDef1_2") end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinWentOracleDef_End
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("playerToOracledefPath") GetPlayerVehicle():PlaceToEndOfPath("playerToOracledefPath") GetPlayerVehicle():SetRotation(Quaternion(0.044, 0.591, 0.010, -0.805))
local veh = getObj("OracleDefenders_vehicle_0") if veh then veh:SetExternalPathByName("OracleDef1_2") veh:PlaceToEndOfPath("OracleDef1_2") veh:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.060, -0.799, 0.063, -0.595)) veh:AddModifier("hp", "+ 2500") veh:setGodMode(0) veh:setImmortalMode(0) end
local veh2 = getObj("OracleDefenders_vehicle_1") if veh2 then veh2:AddModifier("hp", "+ 2500") veh2:setGodMode(0) veh2:setImmortalMode(0) end
StartConversation("OracleGuardian_1") -- StopPlayingCustomMusic()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinTurnOracleDef
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL) TActivate("cinTurnOracleDef_End") FlyLinked( "OralceDef_Path1", GetPlayerVehicle():GetId(), 8, 0, 1, GetPlayerVehicle():GetId(), nil, 1) StartCinematic()
if GetPlayerVehicle() then GetPlayerVehicle():SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(getPos("PointPlayer2_loc"))) GetPlayerVehicle():SetRotation(Quaternion(0.017, 0.788, -0.072, 0.611)) GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("playerOracleDefPath") end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinTurnOracleDef_End
trigger.script:
GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("playerOracleDefPath") GetPlayerVehicle():PlaceToEndOfPath("playerOracleDefPath") GetPlayerVehicle():SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.025, -0.863, 0.060, -0.501))
local veh = getObj("OracleDefenders_vehicle_0") if veh then veh:SetExternalPathByName("OracleDef1_1") veh:PlaceToEndOfPath("OracleDef1_1") veh:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.025, -0.863, 0.060, -0.501)) veh:setGodMode(1) veh:setImmortalMode(1) end
local veh2 = getObj("OracleDefenders_vehicle_1") if veh2 then veh2:setGodMode(1) veh2:setImmortalMode(1) end
TActivate("trWentOracleDefenders") SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle() RestoreAllToleranceStatus() trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinPlCantGoOracle
trigger.script: SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL) TActivate("cinTurnOracleDef_FadeIn") TActivate("cinTurnOracleDef_End") FlyLinked( "OralceDef_Path1", GetPlayerVehicle():GetId(), 8, 1, 0, GetPlayerVehicle():GetId(), nil, 1) StartCinematic() AddCinematicMessage( 11, 1 ) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinPlCantGoOracle_FadeIn
trigger.script: if GetPlayerVehicle() then GetPlayerVehicle():SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(getPos("PointPlayer2_loc"))) GetPlayerVehicle():SetRotation(Quaternion(0.017, 0.788, -0.072, 0.611)) GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("playerOracleDefPath") end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinPlCantGoOracle_End
trigger.script: GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("playerOracleDefPath") GetPlayerVehicle():PlaceToEndOfPath("playerOracleDefPath") GetPlayerVehicle():SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.025, -0.863, 0.060, -0.501)) TActivate("trWentOracleDefenders") SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle() RestoreAllToleranceStatus() trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinExit31ReturnFirst
trigger.script:
EnableGodMode() TActivate("cinExit31ReturnFirst") TActivate("cinExit31Return_FadeIn") TActivate("cinExit31Return_End")
Fly("ExitTo31Return", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, nil, 4, 1,1) StartCinematic()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinExit31Return_FadeIn
trigger.script: GetPlayerVehicle():SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(2893.049, 269.876, 186.546)) GetPlayerVehicle():SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.077, -0.800, -0.013, 0.595)) GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("ReturnPathR3M1") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinExit31Return_End
trigger.script: DisableGodMode() GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("ReturnPathR3M1") GetPlayerVehicle():PlaceToEndOfPath("ReturnPathR3M1") SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle() trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinExit31OkFirst
trigger.script:
EnableGodMode() TDeactivate("trExitToR3M1") TActivate("cinExit31OkFirst") TActivate("cinExit31Ok_FadeIn") TActivate("cinExit31Ok_End")
Fly("ExitTo31Ok", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, nil, 4, 1,1) StartCinematic()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinExit31Ok_FadeIn
trigger.script: GetPlayerVehicle():SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(2942.513, 260.839, 204.028)) GetPlayerVehicle():SetRotation(Quaternion(0.078, 0.555, -0.040, 0.827)) GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("ExitTo31Ok") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinExit31Ok_End
trigger.script: DisableGodMode() TActivate("trExitToR3M1") PassToMap("r3m1", "FromR3M2", 0 , true) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinStopMusik_End
trigger.script: -- PlayCustomMusic("IntenseDialogue01") StopPlayingCustomMusic() trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinPoleFirst
trigger.script:
EnableGodMode() SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL) PlayCustomMusic("Bio01") -- TDeactivate("trExitToR3M1") TActivate("cinPoleFly") -- TActivate("cinExit31Ok_FadeIn") TActivate("cinPole31Ok_End") GetPlayerVehicle():SetThrottle( 0 ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 )
Fly("Pole1", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, nil, 5, 1,0) Fly("Pole2", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, nil, 18, 0,1) StartCinematic()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinPoleFly
trigger.script: AddCinematicMessage( 4, 2 ) AddCinematicMessage( 5, 0.25 ) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinPole31Ok_End
trigger.script: DisableGodMode() StopPlayingCustomMusic() TDeactivate("cinPoleFly") RestoreAllToleranceStatus() trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: OracleRolik
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
PlayCustomMusic("Techno03")
CreateNewDummyObject( "brick_debris1", "CamTochka", -1, -1, CVector(750.608, 280.495, 3124.189), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 0), 1) local vehPl = GetPlayerVehicle() local vehPlID = vehPl:GetId() local CToch = GetEntityByName("CamTochka") local CTochID = CToch:GetId() FlyLinked( "OraclePriezdCam1", CTochID, 7, 1, 0, vehPlID ) Fly("OraclePriezdCam2", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 7, 0, 0 ) Fly("OraclePriezdCam3", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 7, 0, 1 ) StartCinematic()
TActivate("OracleRolikFade") TActivate("OracleRolikCam2") TActivate("OracleRolikEnd")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: OracleRolikFade
trigger.script: local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) vehPlayer:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( false ) vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(824.730, 266.587, 3163.805)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.001, -0.681, 0.002, 0.732)) vehPlayer:SetExternalPathByName("OraclePriezdPath") end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: OracleRolikCam2
trigger.script:
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetExternalPathByName("OraclePriezdPath") vehPlayer:PlaceToEndOfPath("OraclePriezdPath") vehPlayer:setGodMode(0) end
CreateNewDummyObject( "dweller_player", "humPlayer", -1, -1, CVector(696.641, 268.050, 3230.950), Quaternion(0.0000, -0.3007, 0.0000, 0.9537), 0) getObj("humPlayer"):SetNodeAction( AT_STAND2 ) getObj("humPlayer"):SetNextForAnimation( AT_STAND2, AT_STAND1 )
TActivate("OracleVrataOpen")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: OracleRolikEnd
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
StopPlayingCustomMusic()
CompleteQuestIfTaken("r3m1_GoToOracle") CompleteQuestIfTaken("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_Return") CompleteQuestIfTaken("r3m2_OracleMemory_Return") CompleteQuestIfTaken("Disk2OrakulLisa")
local humP = GetEntityByName("humPlayer") if humP then humP:Remove() end local CToch = GetEntityByName("CamTochka") if CToch then CToch:Remove() end
TDeactivate("OracleRolikFade") TDeactivate("OracleRolikCam2")
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetExternalPathByName("OraclePriezdPath") vehPlayer:PlaceToEndOfPath("OraclePriezdPath") vehPlayer:setGodMode(0) end
DisableGodMode()
StartConversation("OracleNPC")
trigger:Deactivate()
